name: Buggy the Bunny
description:
Try to get Buggy Bunny to his yummy box of carrots! Play through 4 informative tutorial levels and 7 challenging platforming levels. The developers, out of the kindness of their hearts, have left a developer panel open you! You can not only adjust Buggy’s speed and how high he can jump. You can adjust the environment around buggy, even gravity. Be careful, the more you adjust these settings the more unstable the game may become.

WARNING: This game may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy.
